welcome.unlockDescription: Log in to sync your event tickets, take part in fun quests, access exclusive perks, and more!

schedule.title: My Events
schedule.description: These are your recommended events based on your favorites and tickets connected in the app. Build your own schedule by adding events to your favorites.

onboarding.importTicketsDescription: Import your event tickets, enable easy crypto payments, and take part in quests.
onboarding.useEmailForSetup: Use the email you used to order your ticket for instant setup.
onboarding.nowConnectWallet: Now you can connect your wallet to continue
onboarding.walletWillBeCreated: A wallet will be created for you during setup
onboarding.emailSentTo: We sent a verification code to
onboarding.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address

pageLayout.needHelpDescription: Find quick answers in our Support FAQ, or tell us if something's not working quite right.

tickets.noTicketsFound: No tickets found on your currently connected email address(es).
tickets.swagDescription: Got swag with your Devconnect ticket? Claim it at the Swag Station using the QR codes below.
tickets.ticketDescription: Grants access to La Rural, the Ethereum World's Fair, and any included side events for Nov 17‚Äì22, 2025.
tickets.loadTicketsDescription: You can load your tickets into the World's Fair app by connecting the email addresses you used to purchase your tickets.
tickets.noTicketsForDate: You have no tickets for this date

settings.tapToInstall: Tap to install the latest version

onramp.connectToAddFunds: Connect your wallet to add funds
onramp.disclaimerText: Use of digital exchanges means you will leave the Devconnect App and be redirected to a third-party which is not operated, controlled by, or under the responsibility of the Ethereum Foundation. You proceed at your own risk.
onramp.providersAcceptCard: Providers accept Card and Wire Transfer
onramp.needHelpDescription: Head to the <onboardingLink>Onboarding area</onboardingLink> near the entrance and let one of our volunteer team know about the technical issue.
onramp.modalTitle:
Using Digital Exchanges:
Legal Disclaimer from the Ethereum Foundation
onramp.modalParagraph1: The use of digital exchanges means you will leave the Devconnect App and be redirected to a third-party which {bold}.
onramp.modalBold1: is not operated or controlled by the Ethereum Foundation
onramp.modalParagraph2: The Ethereum Foundation is not responsible for the context, security, accuracy, or privacy practices of any third-party site.
onramp.modalParagraph3: {bold} to review the third party's Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy before creating an account, providing personal information, or conducting any transactions.
onramp.modalParagraph4: If you decide to access any third party app, {bold}. We reserve the right to withdraw any redirection to a third party app without notice.
onramp.modalBold4: you do so entirely at your own risk

highlights.title: Highlights
highlights.ethconDescription: Discover how Ethereum can help shape the future of Argentina.
highlights.ethereumDayDescription: The main Ethereum event and official opening of the week. Come early!
highlights.installAppDescription: Install the app, claim your perks, and setup your wallets to get started
highlights.devconnectPerksDescription: Need an e-sim, a crypto card, cheap accommodation, interesting activations or activities? Check out the perks page.

onboardingSteps.finalSteps: Final steps: let's learn about the World's Fair!
onboardingSteps.welcomeTitle: Welcome to Devconnect ARG: the first Ethereum World's Fair
onboardingSteps.welcomeDescription1: You're joining 15,000+ builders and users from around the world as we imagine the city of the future, built on Ethereum.
onboardingSteps.welcomeDescription2Bold: Ethereum is ready for the real world
onboardingSteps.welcomeDescription2: ‚Äì we're excited to show you how.
onboardingSteps.aboutDescription: During Devconnect, La Rural will be transformed into the first Ethereum World's Fair:
onboardingSteps.aboutBlock1: Join events featuring <bold>industry leaders</bold> and builders working on Ethereum today
onboardingSteps.aboutBlock2: Discover cutting-edge, <bold>real-world Ethereum apps</bold> at the App Showcase
onboardingSteps.aboutBlock3: Recharge and refuel at the many local <bold>coffee and food merchants on-site</bold> (all accepting crypto as payment)
onboardingSteps.questsTitle: Take part in Quests and earn real rewards!
onboardingSteps.questsDescription: We've created dedicated quest systems to help you explore the World's Fair, regardless of your experience level.
onboardingSteps.questsBlock1: Master the basics of Ethereum through our <bold>Onboarding</bold> quests
onboardingSteps.questsBlock2: Grab your collectible 'Stamp' from each booth at the <bold>App Showcase</bold>

requiresAuth.defaultMessage: To access this page, sign in to your account.
